title: 15 MIN STRETCH FOR SPLITS (front splits flexibility routine)
description:
Do this 15 min stretch routine #WithMe to get your FRONT SPLITS! This is a great BEGINNERS guide to getting your splits. We are focusing on hamstring and hip flexibility in this one. This is a great routine to include into your daily life if getting your splits is your goal!
#Stretching #HomeWorkout
⭐️ SHOP MY COOKBOOKS!: https://goo.gl/XHwUJg 

👉🏼THE MAT I USE (Exercise 6X4): http://gorillamats.com?aff=19  (MADFIT10 for 10% off)

My goal is to help inspire everyone at all fitness levels to get up, get moving and reach their goals!
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/SdltgVDEPmM" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: Sliiiiiiding into the weekend with this splits stretch!! I know a lot of you guys have been requesting this one so I hope you enjoy!! Remember...flexibility takes a lot of time, patience, and consistency! Splits won't come overnight. But if you practice daily, you'll see progress in no time! ❤️

When I was 17 I was so close to doing a split (I was also a Latin dancer). Now I'm 24 and in terrible shape. I don't even have the energy to work out for 10 minutes because my stress is fighting my body. So I decided to start stretching again. I'm on day 2 currently. Wish me luck 🤞🏻
Oh my goodness, I am a 47 yrs old women, and i just started wit Madfit last year, this is the 1st time i was able to almost touch the floor. Thank  you so much. I am accomplishing a split.

FINALLY DOING THE SPLITS! Bum touched the floor for the first time today. Been incorporating this stretch into my routine for the last 3 months. I'd been using a different stretch routine for the last year, but this one nudged me to the finish line. Thank you so much!

i finally can do my splits guyyysss!!! it took me about 4 and a half month, and I stretched nearly every day (but bodies are different, some can do the split in 2 weeks some need to stretch for some month)
